subject: Fix terminal tab-queued messages not sending
description: Bug: in terminal UI, queued messages created via Tab while processing never send (or donâ€™t flush after stream completes). Investigate packages/terminal/src/components/App.tsx processQueue + isProcessing/activeInline gating and Input.tsx Tab queue path. Ensure queued messages are drained when processing finishes (done/error/interrupt) and not blocked by stale inlinePending. Add logging/guards if needed, keep behavior for interrupt/inline intact.
